q: Ben Young of Richmond thinks Mike Pence made the right decision. " My hope is that he runs for governor. I think it's rather fortuitous that it's open at this particular time, " Ben Young said. I think it's obvious that he wants to serve in perhaps a higher capacity. Mike Pence Steve Cohen , D-Tennessee, used a late night House floor speech Tuesday to hit Republicans for what he called " lies " about a government takeover of the health care system, and evoked Nazi propagandist Joseph Goebbels. They say it's a government takeover of health care, a big lie, just like Goebbels. You say it enough, you repeat the lie, you repeat the lie, you repeat the lie and eventually people believe it, he said. Steve Cohen , who is Jewish, went on to compare that " lie " to the term " blood libel, " a phrase that historically was used to falsely accuse Jews of killing Christian children.

Mike Pence Chris Lee , R-N.Y., resigned Wednesday three hours after and a shirtless photo of the married congressman that he sent to a woman he met responding to a " Women for Men " post on Craigslist. It has been a tremendous honor to serve the people of Western New York. I regret the harm that my actions have caused my family, my staff and my constituents. I deeply and sincerely apologize to them all.
